com.smartcampus.android.ui.graph

Class FloorLocationAdapterCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.smartcampus.android.ui.graph.FloorLocationAdapterCreator

  • public class FloorLocationAdapterCreator
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    rhansen In several places (RemoveEdge, AddEdge and com.smartcampus.android.ui.Map2D) a pair of spinners go together. Namely, a floor spinner that selects a given floor and a location spinner which is updated accordingly to only show location from that floor. This common functionality (setup) is done in this class.
